# Complex Project Rules

This project demonstrates all OpenCode customization types.

## Structure
- `.opencode/agent/` - Custom agents
- `.opencode/command/` - Custom commands
- `.opencode/skill/` - Reusable skills
- `.opencode/tool/` - Custom tools
- `.opencode/plugin/` - Plugins

## Guidelines
- Use appropriate customization type for each use case
- Prefer skills for multi-file reusable workflows
